attributes.action: prevent "unlimited" being used for services with restrictions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "Unlimited downloads", "no download limits", "download all you can".  Phrases we've all heard, yet most have limitations hidden in small print, often called "Acceptable Use Policy".  Bring strict rules governing the use of words that have a hidden meaning - Unlimited should be unlimited, not subject to an Acceptable Use Policy!

rejection.details: there are lots of petitions already with similar themes
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
